name: tm16
effect: Teaches Light Screen to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Light Screen to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Icy Wind Gen I: Pay Day)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Creates a wall of
light that lowers
SP. ATK damage.

cuts damage from
